entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking to Harry and the car. He is described as patting the dashboard nervously.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as responding to Ron's words and squinting through the darkness for a landmark.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as jumping at Harry's shout.

entities.name: harry's car
entities.description: The car is described as shuddering and losing speed. Ron is talking to the car.

entities.name: hogwarts castle
entities.description: Hogwarts castle is mentioned as being silhouetted on the dark horizon.

entities.name: the lake
entities.description: The lake is described as having a smooth, black, glassy surface.

relationships.description: Ron is talking to the car.
Harry sees Hogwarts castle silhouetted on the dark horizon.
Ron sees Hogwarts castle silhouetted on the dark horizon.
The car is approaching the lake.
